aston.nabneyit.util

Class Machine

  • java.lang.Object
    • aston.nabneyit.util.Unit
      • aston.nabneyit.util.Machine

  • public class Machine
extends Unit
    Implements a general machine class that carries out a process of some timespan on the first item in the queue that represents its input line. Once a piece of food is finished, it is passed on to a Connector that takes it to the next unit in the factory.

    A machine may jam with a probability specified in the constructor. If this happens it can do nothing for a time (also specified in the constructor) and any food item that it is processing is spoiled.

    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Ian T. Nabney

       int jamTime)
        Creates machine with its input queue
        Parameters:
        procTime - time spent to process an item
        jamProb - probability that machine jams in a single time step
        jamTime - length of time that the machine remains jammed for
